column5: suffeRing ??? You  are new at this aren't you. It's spelt SUFFFERING.  Congrats and good luck. Although you are off to a good start already. Her playing with your fly....in public no less    Does she have an unwed sister?
just thought i would share this . not that i can relate to it---lol   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AwSoYhJ9NkE
Ha ha...that was great. I'm not a C&W fan, by a long shot, but that was a good one. Thought of calling the wife over to watch, but then realized that it wouldn't go over that well. I can relate     .
Boot +   = peace and quiet!
I can relate oh so well
I hear C & W causes brain damage..    HD
Plenty o evidence of that right there.
yup,,,nothin like being 41 and married
Thanks for the heads up guys... two days, seven hours, and 5 Minutes till:
Entertaining... but my little cupcake  :worthy:     says I can't watch it ever again    Run Forrest Run!!!
Pray for the dead and the dead will pray for you.
oh no...she's got you counting down..this is worse than I thought... ever seen what happens to a bomb when the timer hits 0?  Seriously - Congratulations!

Hey at least she fishies too.  Also to top that off she says that jumping a red eye flight to Calgary and bumming around the bow and area for a week sound like a great trip.  As long as I carry the heavy backpack(tent and camping gear) we can just crash on the river bank at night.  We have even talked about drifting the bow starting in Banff, and camping along the way.  Anyone want to tag along...
Do you have a pic,of the bride to be? LOL  Good luck to the both of you. Congrats,,,,,,,,,,,,,I think.
Well here she is training to be a good wife by tying flies for her husband.  http://i237.photobucket.com/albums/ff237/t.../Picture027.jpg
hmmm  yep,,,she's lookin real happy doing that there!,,lol

2 things you have too do before you get married.  1, Buy a plot, If you are going to bury yourself, you might as well be burried where you want.  2. You buy the ball and chain, If you leave it up to the wife,She will get you a girly man one(pink and fuzzie).

How can I resist... I like that song, but do remember there are those of US (the female gender) out there that just don't fit the bill...  However I am not sure Fishmaster would agree but ... lmao  Congrats on your up and coming marriage VMAN - That sounds like the perfect honey moon.
Joeys got you by the short and curllies eh Paul
Thats too funny !!!! thanks for the laugh....
HEY VMAN::: you should get GREENCOACHDOG to cater your reception... he makes all kinds of fresh meat dinners!!!! your guests will be surpised at the menu!!!!

Funny clip, I can relate all too well too.  Vman, congratulations (I think), communication and having your partner know where you stand on your interests and understanding where her interests are will possibly help.
Too late...it's done...All three rings...The engagement ring....The wedding ring and the suffeRING.
A quick peek at the Wedding...  http://s237.photobucket.com/albums/ff237/t...g-Scrapblog.pbw

What a beautiful Bride and you made a handsome groom as well.  How heart warming to see the effort you put into that photo display...  May your everyday create memories that you hold close to your hearts for a lifetime!  Congrats  Jen
